name: Alea iacta est (Mikulus)
description:
Alea iacta est (Latin: "The die is cast") is a short puzzle game with fifteen unique levels. Player can move dice/cube on the board. In order to beat a given level, all red tiles have to be turned green by using appropriate in-game mechanics. Levels' difficulty becomes harder progressively.

This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
